ResearchProjectDef.label: high-density hydroponics
ResearchProjectDef.description: This research venture focuses on the development of "High Density Hydroponics," an advanced agricultural technology characterized by accelerated crop growth and the ability to thrive within extremely limited spaces. The implementation of "Maxi-Growth Matrices" powered by nanites will enable rapid and efficient plant cultivation. However, it should be noted that the adoption of this technology will necessitate a substantial increase in power consumption. Upon successful completion of this research, colonies will have access to highly productive hydroponic systems, yielding faster and more abundant harvests despite spatial constraints.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ultra-density hydroponics
ResearchProjectDef.description: This research delves deeper into the realm of cutting-edge agricultural technology. This system utilizes robust materials and more intricate components to further enhance plant growth. While consuming a considerable amount of power, it brings crop cultivation remarkably close to the level of Archotech growth technology. With its unparalleled efficiency and ability to thrive within extremely confined spaces, colonies can anticipate a near-Archotech level of agricultural output, revolutionizing the future of sustainable food production. Glitterworld companies use millions of hydroponics like this to feed the entire planet using just 0.01% of the land-use.
